verses.roman:
ei-mata kīrtana prabhu karila kata-kṣaṇa
āpana-udyoge nācāila bhakta-gaṇa

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; kīrtana—chanting; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karila—performed; kata-kṣaṇa—for some time; āpana—personal; udyoge—by endeavor; nācāila—caused to dance; bhakta-gaṇa—all the devotees.
translation: The Lord performed kīrtana for some time and, through His own endeavor, inspired all the devotees to dance.
